pageContext.description: The centre i.e. immediately below stop is sunken and indistinct.
pageContext.patina: At A: a patch of thick muddy brown also on septum between the wings. Another patch at B (on the side).
pageContext.surface: Greyish white at butt end. Beneath this a light greenish pitted surface. Bronze shows at prominent parts and at broken edge.
pageContext.other: Site: unspecified location in Carnarvonshire - geolocation not accurate to 10 kms.,Width: edge 55mm; section of septum 22mm; butt 21mm,Thickness: 17mm; 9.5mm; 23.5mm,Weight: 276.41 gms
pageContext.collection: 1 in a Private Collection,April 1924,Mr. Hemp obtained
pageContext.remarks: This information was communicated by Mr. Wilfred J. Hemp
